summary: After shockingly winning the Eurovision Song Competition in 2006, Mr. Lordi, the monster of Lapland, and his horror metal band lose almost everything. Will the man behind Mr. Lordi find a way to stay true to himself and make a comeback?

keywords: psychological|metal band|heavy metal singer|heavy metal musician|eurovision
title: Monsterimies
